attributes.review: I downloaded this app to educate myself on the elections and understand who our president is and why we should re elect him. It just watches me and shakes it‚Äôs head at me all the time.

attributes.review: Went on this app and it knew I was Puerto Rican. A notification piped up saying they would change my birth certificate to say I was Mexican and they would deport me and my family.  After this I went to chic-fil-a and they took forever to give me my food and by then it was all cold and soggy. 10/10 would not recommend.
